title: Surface-modified spinel high entropy oxide with hybrid coating-layer for enhanced cycle stability and lithium-ion storage performance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33124-33132
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06878E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Feiyue Zhai, Shengji Gao, Wenfeng Zhang, Gaoping Cao, Huimin Zhang, Yalan Xing, Yu Xiang, Shichao Zhang
This work demonstrates a method to enhance the electrochemical performance of spinel HEO (FeCoNiCrMn)3O4 by coating it with a hybrid layer of lithium titanate and carbon.
